QuestData.Title: The Corpulent One
QuestData.Description: North of here and west of Northdale, you will find the corpulent maggot beast, Borelgore.$B$BI've lost entire regiments to that monster. His size knows no bounds! The more he eats the greater his girth becomes...$B$BWhile I would not suffer any emotional harm should the beast devour you, I would prefer that you were the victor. Borelgore has been known to devour others who tried to hunt him.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Borelgore in the northern wastes of Eastern Plaguelands and destroy him.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have I told you lately that I hate you?
QuestData.RewardText: Keep this up and I may have to keep you here at Eastwall, $r.
